title: "New Jerseyans believe artificial intelligence needs oversight, according to Stockton poll"
excerpt: "More than one-third of New Jersey residents think the increased use of artificial intelligence will make their lives worse, according to a poll by the William J. Hughes Center for Public Policy at Stockton University released Monday."
